Cases.Title: The Double Pile
Cases.Overview: There we go, I've gathered all the clues into two big piles by the fireplace. |Is...that better?
Cases.Instruction: Mix the clues into two single piles. Choose a pile and take the top clue when you earn one. |(You can't pick which color clue you get when you solve a scene.)

Cases.Title: The Cat in the Crowd
Cases.Overview: Our cameras caught Colton stealing the MacGuffin but he has run off into the crowd. |Find him before he can escape.
Cases.Instruction: Do not select a random culprit and mix the culprit tiles. Whenever you solve a scene, flip over two culprit tiles. |(Repeat until you catch Colton.)

Cases.Title: Not Catching a Cold
Cases.Overview: I'm afraid some guests have left their umbrellas. |Find the guests which whom they belong to, otherwise they might get a nasty cold from the rain!
Cases.Instruction: Do not select a random culprit and mix the culprit tiles. Start with the umbrella and fan clues. Whenever you solve a scene, pick two culprit tiles. |(Repeat until you find the culprits that match both clues.)

Cases.Title: The Misplaced MacGuffin
Cases.Overview: Our curator has forgotten where he placed the MacGuffin. |He seems to only recall that it was in a room filled with these symbols. |Help him find where |he misplaced it!
Cases.Instruction: Find a scene that contains all of these symbols |{symbols%} |(You do not have to solve each scene)
Cases.Task: You do not need to choose or catch a random culprit.

Cases.Title: The Lost Jewelry
Cases.Overview: We caught the thief red handed, carrying a sack of valuable jewelry. |Now we have to find whom each item belongs to!
Cases.Instruction: Start with the necklace clue and mix the culprit tiles. Whenever you solve a scene, pick two culprit tiles and check if they match with the necklace clue.

Cases.Title: The Ocean's Four
Cases.Overview: There's something fishy about these suspects. I'm certain one of them is lying. |But...which one?
Cases.Instruction: Start with {culprit1}, {culprit2}, {culprit3} and {culprit4} culprit tiles and remove the {clue1}, {clue2} and all purple clue tiles.
Cases.Task: Catch one culprit by matching the suspect to a green, a red, and a blue clue tiles.

Cases.Title: Crowd Confusion
Cases.Overview: I spotted {culprit1} and {culprit2} run off into the crowd with the MacGuffin! |Catch them before they can escape.
Cases.Instruction: Mix the culprit tiles. Whenever you solve a scene, flip over two culprit tiles. |(Repeat until you catch both culprits.)

Cases.Title: The Triple Pile
Cases.Overview: There we go, I've gathered all the clues into three big piles by the fireplace. |Is...this any better?
Cases.Instruction: Mix the clues into three single piles. Choose a pile and take the top clue when you earn one. |(You can't pick which color clue you get when you solve a scene.)

Cases.Title: The Missing Walrus
Cases.Overview: Someone has kidnapped the manager! |Help us find whoever did it!
Cases.Instruction: Mix the culprit tiles. Whenever you solve a scene, flip over two culprit tiles. |(Repeat until you catch both culprits.)

Cases.Title: The Callous Calling Card
Cases.Overview: The thief left their calling card at the scene of the crime. |Catch them before they can escape.
Cases.Instruction: Collect a clue only if the solved scene contains any one of |{symbols%} |(Do not collect a clue if the scene does not contain any of these symbols.)

Cases.Title: The Doomsday Calendar
Cases.Overview: Doomsday is upon us! The Apocalypse can be averted if we bring the idol to the room with these symbols. Quickly... we must act at once!
Cases.Instruction: Find a scene that matches these symbols |{symbols%} |(You must solve each scene)
Cases.Task: You do not need to choose or catch a random culprit.
